generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, flanked by parked cars and buildings.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and some vegetation, with parked cars adjacent to it.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including brick and white facades with windows and commercial signs.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the street, providing shade and lining the sidewalks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing partly cloudy.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the street, and a few are in motion or positioned in the middle of the road.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Parking" sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights along the road.
- person: A person can be seen standing near the sidewalk on the left side of the street, near a parked car.
